title: Pixel3 rebooting/freezing (also in safe mode) - but not if spotify runs.
content:
My Pixel3 is rebooting(often) / freezing (sometimes) - since a couple of days.
I already checked a lot of info that i found:
- it also reboots when charging
- it also reboots when just lying around
- it also reboots in safe mode
-battery temp seems to be ok (accubattery)
-storage is fine (<60%)

i am a little bit hesitate to use the factory reset option due to two factors:
1) it seems that it is not rebooting when i have spotify constantly running (and/or when the screen stays on all the time)
2) i have a lot of 2wa apps (for work) need to make sure that all of it is working in no-time.

any idea what i could check? maybe a hint in regard to the mentioned spotify/display on phenomenon.

thanks!
